name: Tower & push
description:
Small game for local vs only.

Objective:

Charge you way into the enemy base and access there core.

Use Tower to defend your lane and push with champions and minions.

Use the 'Overlord' menu to change your champions mode and upgrade towers.

Controls: (Rebind-able through the launcher)

Player1Player 2Up
wUp ArrowLeftaLeft ArrowRightdRight ArrowDownsDown ArrowActionLeft CtrlNumpad 0
